original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Hew thee two tables of stone like unto the first: and I will write upon these tables the words that were in the first tables, which thou brakest.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 돌판 둘을 처음 것과 같이 다듬어 만들라 네가 깨뜨린 처음 판에 있던 말을 내가 그 판에 쓰리니

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses
Hew thee two tables of stone
and I will write upon these tables
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 이 돌판 위에 쓸 것이다

sentences.original_text: the words that were in the first tables
